pageContext.claim: “We have more natural resources under our feet than any other country. That’s a pretty big statement. Ten years ago, five years ago even, you couldn’t make that statement.”
pageContext.analysis: Led by the hydraulic fracturing techniques, the United States and the rest of the world have been in the midst of an energy revolution, but that began nearly 15 years ago. The U.S. has exported more energy than it has imported since 2015. Saudi Arabia leads the world with one-fifth of the world's oil reserves.
